channel.title: JolBB - A new Java based MMORPG - Pictures Added
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/rj0hvo.png[/img] [b]Website Development[/b] Our website development has started! please [url=http://google.com]check it out here.[/url] - Removed by Mod -> Google JolBB The website contains the most recent releases, bug fixes, and shoutouts. EVERYTHING on this website is copywrited by JolBB (me) all pictures have been done from scratch in Photoshop. You may register on the website, but the game is not going to be out until probably Summer 2012. This is because we have to create many items, and the game itself.
[b]Current Website Features:[/b] [code] 6/29/11 - Promote system on Admin CP - 100% 6/29/11 - Revamped News Feed (Delete Added) - 100% 6/29/11 - Cleaned Up Some Website Code - 100% 6/29/11 - 17 New Items Added To Items - NEUTRAL 6/29/11 - Profile Page With Online Character on it - 100% 6/28/11 - Admin CP - 80% 6/28/11 - News Page - 100% 6/28/11 - Statistic Page - 100% 6/28/11 - Profile Page - 100% 6/27/11 - Login Page - 100% 6/27/11 - Register - 100% 6/27/11 - Logout - 100% [/code]
[b]Server Development: 0%[/b] We are currently working on a text-based server to be released soon - this will not be the actual game, the real game will be kind of like Runescape Classic
[b]MEDIA[/b] [b]Character Displayed on Profile page (I just put random variables for a test since the server hasn't began and it worked)[/b] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/jv3uoz.png[/img]
[b]Promote system working (and peek at the Admin CP bar)[/b] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/sziweb.png[/img]
[b]Working Statistic Page - All Counters are 100% Accurate.[/b] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/zbbyb.png[/img]
[b]The Staff:[/b] [b]Mod Marcello[/b]

That is a sexy website.

Pffffft. I could do better.

P.S. Fix up them forums some. :S

item.title: JolBB - A new Java based MMORPG - Pictures Added
item.dc:creator: @JolBB JolBB
item.description:
@JolBB wrote:

Because I re-vamped the coding, the layout stayed but I had written my codes very messy and a lot of unnecessary codes were in there so I had to clean it out, so I just re-did every single page’s code, like statistics now counts the players registered as oppose to the other way it handled it.

Read full topic

item.source: JolBB - A new Java based MMORPG - Pictures Added

item.title: JolBB - A new Java based MMORPG - Pictures Added
item.dc:creator: @JolBB JolBB
item.description:
@JolBB wrote:

It’s going to be based off of Runescape classic, but with different items and more features, and the cache will not be exactly runescape’s making the server legal so I won’t have to worry about anything etc. I probably will rip some codes like maybe the tabs and edit it a bit but that’s all. Also what if I remove the register? So then it won’t be advertising really, it was never meant to be it’s just better to see the site in action then pictures y’know?

Read full topic
item.source: JolBB - A new Java based MMORPG - Pictures Added

item.title: JolBB - A new Java based MMORPG - Pictures Added
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’ve removed your site link, you can’t advertise like that

Also, I don’t get this. Is it just a normal server with some different features added to make it special, or are you actually making your own MMORPG?

Read full topic

That’d be great… Oh well. And looking forward to seeing what you come up with about the storyline stuff.

item.title: JolBB - A new Java based MMORPG - Pictures Added
item.dc:creator: @JolBB JolBB
item.description:
@JolBB wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:9, topic:401173”][quote author=JolBB link=topic=498234.msg3643980#msg3643980 date=1309228291]

Website looks sexy let’s hope the game does too, will be watching this thread

Thanks, took me a whole day to make that layout
[/quote]Thats not long… My ZerkerScape site took me like 2 to 3 days to get it where I wanted it xD. Also, good job (if you coded it from blank) cause it looks like a pro site.[/quote]
Thanks , and yes 100% from scratch. Blank CSS and HTML (PHP) EVERYTHING created on the website (pics/layout/etc.) is copywrited/owned by me JolBB.

And later in development if you want I can make you a website layout. I’m pretty good with CSS and HTML took it in school

Thanks for your support : )

Read full topic

item.title: JolBB - A new Java based MMORPG - Pictures Added
item.dc:creator: @JolBB JolBB
item.description:
@JolBB wrote:


Website Development
Our website development has started! please check it out here. - Removed by Mod -> Google JolBB
The website contains the most recent releases, bug fixes, and shoutouts. EVERYTHING on this website is copywrited by JolBB (me) all pictures have been done from scratch in Photoshop.
You may register on the website, but the game is not going to be out until probably Summer 2012. This is because we have to create many items, and the game itself.

Current Website Features:

6/29/11 - Promote system on Admin CP - 100%
6/29/11 - Revamped News Feed (Delete Added) - 100%
6/29/11 - Cleaned Up Some Website Code - 100%
6/29/11 - 17 New Items Added To Items - NEUTRAL
6/29/11 - Profile Page With Online Character on it - 100%
6/28/11 - Admin CP - 80%
6/28/11 - News Page - 100%
6/28/11 - Statistic Page - 100%
6/28/11 - Profile Page - 100%
6/27/11 - Login Page - 100%
6/27/11 - Register - 100%
6/27/11 - Logout - 100%

Server Development: 0%
We are currently working on a text-based server to be released soon - this will not be the actual game, the real game will be kind of like Runescape Classic

MEDIA
Character Displayed on Profile page (I just put random variables for a test since the server hasn’t began and it worked)

Promote system working (and peek at the Admin CP bar)

Working Statistic Page - All Counters are 100% Accurate.

The Staff:
Mod Marcello
